rootCause: The helm-oci-install wrapper prefixed parameters even when the caller already used name=value, producing chart=chart=oci://... and shuffling other inputs, so Helm rejected the chart URL format.
resolution: Forwarded the raw CLI tokens only once and added name=value parsing in _helm-oci-deploy to map fields correctly, preventing double prefixes and matching the documented example. Verified the generated command with just -n to confirm the chart URL is well-formed.
references: just helm-oci-install release=dspace namespace=dspace chart=oci://ghcr.io/democratizedspace/charts/dspace values=docs/examples/dspace.values.dev.yaml,docs/examples/dspace.values.staging.yaml version_file=docs/apps/dspace.version default_tag=v3-latest
